successes.title: The Bill Nye Film
successes.description: Help two fans make the definitive film on Bill Nye The Science Guy and his quest to change the world with science!

Pledges.description: GIVE BILL A HIGH $5

Welcome to the team! You get progress reports about the film, exclusive access to behind the scenes anecdotes, images, updates and clips. Plus, you'll get a shout out on twitter and the satisfaction of giving 'The Science Guy' a high five!
BILL NYE EMOJI SET
20+ Bill Nye themed emojis: 'The Science Guy' face palm, bunsen burners, beakers, LightSail, and Bill's old boss! You'll also get progress reports, exclusive updates, and a shoutout.
THE BILL NYE RARE DIGITAL BUNDLE
Receive a rare digital bundle featuring an eclectic assortment of articles, historic photographs, interviews, GIFs, text message tones featuring Bill's catchphrases and much much more!
Plus, you get the exclusive Bill Nye Emoji Set and updates from the film!
BILL'S HAND WRITTEN NOTES FROM THE 'HAMM ON NYE DEBATE'
Own a special piece of history with a PDF of Bill's handwritten notes from the epic debate in Kentucky with creationist Ken Hamm. Plus, everything above!
STREAM THE BILL NYE FILM
Be the first to stream the film on a private link, *before* it is released to the public on VOD platforms. Exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. Also, you get everything above.
BILL'S EDUCATION BUNDLE
Get Bill's top ten experiments to share with kids and a list of his favorite science movies and books. Plus, you get a #shelfie of Bill in front of his bookcase. You get everything above, too!
PLUTO CORK COASTERS (SET of 4)

We’re excited to collaborate with a talented artist to produce these limited edition, custom etched Pluto cork coasters to commemorate the New Horizons flyby, accompanied by a now-famous Bill Nye quote, “Humankind does great things when ideas get off the ground."
Also you get all digital rewards under $25 and under.
BOW TIE FOR YOUR DOG
It's about time your dog got dapper. This doggie neckware* is crafted specially for your pooch's collar and comes in various styles and sizes.
Also you get the entire digital collection, all rewards under $35.
*Reward does not include doggie lab coat nor safety doggles-- er, goggles.
CUSTOM Bill NYE COFFEE MUG
Kickstarter exclusive, custom-made & beautifully designed Bill Nye Film coffee mug featuring C8H10N4O2 (the molecular formula for caffeine) and Bill's catchphrase: "It's not magic, it's science!"
Also you get the entire digital collection, all rewards under $35, plus your name in the credits of the film.
EXCLUSIVE HANKSY T-SHIRT
Kickstarter exclusive t-shirt from prankster street artist Hanksy! This wildly popular print has never been on a t-shirt before. Get it!
Also you get all digital rewards under $25 and under.
THANK YOU IN THE CREDITS
Everyone who supports this film is a star, but some of you are supernovas. Chose this reward and get your name in the film credits.
Also you get the entire digital collection, all rewards under $35. If you want the doggie Bow Tie, you can opt in for that too.
CUSTOM BILL NYE FLASK
Kickstarter exclusive, custom-made & beautifully designed Bill Nye Film flask featuring CH3CH2OH (the molecular formula for alcohol) and Bill's catchphrase: "It's not magic, it's science!"
Also you get the entire digital collection, all rewards under $35, plus your name in the credits of the film.
CHARON & PLUTO CORK COASTERS (SET of 8)
